description:
Posted by

Shelly Romine Spruell 2nd

Director of Human Resources at Click Here Digital

Send InMail

Click Here Digital is looking for a senior software engineer to design and implement new systems and features, as well as modify and maintain existing systems for adaptation changes to the business and/or technology. The senior software engineer interfaces directly with IT management, engineering teams, internal stakeholders, and vendors to ensure the successful delivery of high-quality software.




To be successful as a senior software engineer, you should have a proven ability to juggle multiple projects in a fast-paced environment and an extensive amount of experience building features with a strong focus on security, scalability, stability, and speed. Ultimately, a senior software engineer will ensure that software deliverables comply with the department and business quality standards and are completed on time and within budget.




As a senior software engineer, you will report directly to the VP of Engineering, providing support and mentorship to junior and mid-level software engineers and working in close partnership with the middle and executive management teams.

Responsibilities:

Serve as a technical lead contributing to and directing the efforts of the engineering team(s), including collaborating with internal and external team members
Designing, developing, testing, deploying, maintaining, and improving software components and services
Participate in peer reviews by providing constructive feedback and suggestions for improvement of code quality and efficiency
Create technical documentation and diagrams for application functionality
Contribute to the planning and estimation of software projects
Ability to work a flexible schedule during peak periods, typically during the client reporting period to assist with troubleshooting and/or issue resolution

Required Skills and Experience:

Bachelorâ€™s degree Computer Science or related field
Minimum of 8 years of professional programming experience
High proficiency in designing, developing, and implementing scalable software solutions
Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Demonstrated ability and willingness to lead others
Demonstrated organization and project management skills
Ability to work independently and as part of a team with limited supervision




Technical Expertise:

PEVN Stack (PostgreSQL, Node.js, Express.js, Vue.js) - 5 years
PHP (Laravel framework) - 3 years
Python - 3 years (preferred)
Go - 2 years (preferred)
Docker - 5 years
Kubernetes - 3 years

Preferred Skills and Experience:

Proficiency with Terraform
Strong knowledge of the AWS ecosystem, including EC2, ECS, RDS, SQS, CloudWatch, Lambda, ElastiCache, etc.

Company

Our mission is to onboard the next billion people onto crypto. We are starting off by building a seamless user onboarding experience for crypto-native applications.




Raised $3m in seed
Small team based in Seoul and Bay Area with remote option available (core work hours are 1-8p PST)
Open roles are listed below, but we are looking for all types of hackers & builders




ðŸ’¡ To apply â€” email resume to sisun@ramper.xyz




Overview

We are looking for a frontend engineer to join the founding team to make digital ownership and identity human-centric and accessible to everyone. You will develop the core web experiences that will onboard the next billion users onto web3.




Responsibilities

Develop consumer-facing applications to bridge everyday users to web3
Be obsessed with the customer experience
Make key decisions on frontend technology and architecture with the team
Own and be responsible for face-paced, iterative development processes
Work closely with the co-founders
Accelerate the growth in all aspects of your career




Requirements

Experience with Typescript
5+ years of progressive experience, showing growth in responsibilities and impact within a team environment
Experience with React, React Hooks, and Redux
Experience in all phases of testing (unit, integration, end-to-end)
Experience in CSS preprocessors like LESS or SCSS
Strong interpersonal skills that demonstrate empathy and the ability to distill technical concepts into digestible pieces
Experience in Next.js, Firebase, GCP, and/or AWS is a plus
Experience in building a Dapp or interacting with the Ethereum blockchain is a plus. For example, ethers.js, useDApps, and web3-react.

Every day, tens of millions of people from around the world come to Roblox to play, learn, work, and socialize in immersive digital experiences created by the community. Our vision is to build a platform that enables shared experiences among billions of users. This is whatâ€™s known as the metaverse: a persistent space where anyone can do just about anything they can imagine, from anywhere in the world and on any device. Join us and youâ€™ll usher in a new category of human interaction while solving exceptional challenges that you wonâ€™t find anywhere else.

As a software engineer in the Infra Compute organization you are going to be creating, supporting, and evolving the compute infrastructure at Roblox as we build out Robloxâ€™s Private Cloud.


Container orchestration and cluster management; 
Service-to-service communication and networking (including Service Mesh and the API Gateway); and 
Scheduling, provisioning, and management of the growing Roblox machine fleet.

Come help us create, support and evolve the infra that manages the millions of containers that serve hundreds of millions of requests per second.

You Are

1+ year of industry experience
Care deeply about production health and reliable, sustainable production systems
Love for building and supporting networks, systems and large scale distributed infrastructure
Customer, team, and quality oriented
Like getting things done

You Will

Create, build, and support the cluster management, and service infrastructure that powers Roblox

Industry-leading compensation package
Excellent medical, dental, and vision coverage
A rewarding 401k program
Flexible vacation policy
Roflex - Flexible and supportive work policy 
Roblox Admin badge for your avatar
At Roblox HQ: 
Free catered lunches
Onsite fitness center and fitness program credit
Annual CalTrain Go Pass

Houzz is the worldâ€™s leading platform for home remodeling and design, helping more than 2.5 million home professionals in over 100 categories to grow and manage their business. Through Houzz, a community of more than 65 million homeowners and home design enthusiasts, find ideas, hire professionals, source products and access tools to update their homes from start to finish. Houzz is available in every country around the world with localized platforms in more than 10 countries across North America, Europe, Asia and Australia.

As a Senior Software Engineer, you will be a key contributor on our communication platform team that powers the product features that serve Houzz users. You will be responsible for designing and developing features to power homeowners and professionals to efficiently communicate on the platform.

__________________

What Youâ€™ll Do

 Lead and evaluate technical tradeoffs 
 Drive the design and implementation of projects full stack 
 Following the software development lifecycle 

At a Minimum, Weâ€™d Like You to Have

 3+ years of industry experience in ads quality, machine learning, recommendation, and/or information retrieval 
 Strong communication skills 
 Proven track record of delivering results 
 B.S., M.S., or Ph.D. in Computer Science or equivalent 

Ideally, You'll Also Have

 Passion for working in a dynamic and collaborative environment 
 Independence, self-direction and experience owning complete products and features 

__________________

Be Who You Are and Do What You Love at Houzz 

Weâ€™re a Family

At Houzz, we strive to create and foster a strong family environment in our workplace. We collaborate to accomplish our goals, always working as a team. We aim to build a culture of inclusion â€” celebrating and leveraging our differences for the betterment of one another, our products and our community.

Houzz team members come from many backgrounds and bring diverse experiences to the company. We take pride in making each person feel at home.

We Build the Future

Join Houzz in revolutionizing the home remodeling and design industry and have an impact on our community of more than 65 million homeowners and home design enthusiasts who use our platform and the 2.5 million-plus home professionals around the world who grow and manage their business with Houzz Pro. Houzz has been named one of the most innovative companies in the world by CNBC and others, and is backed by top venture capitalists. At Houzz, you can help drive the future of an industry worth over $1 trillion in the U.S. and Europe alone.

We Make Things Happen 

Our team members play a key role in guiding the direction of our company and are able to work across multiple groups to implement fresh ideas that allow Houzz to be the industry leader. If you are interested in applying your passion to create products that will transform the lives of millions of people who are designing, remodeling and decorating their homes, welcome to Houzz.

Benefits and Perks

 Competitive salary 
 Flexible paid time off 
 Commuter benefits 
 Medical, dental, vision and pet insurance 
 Maternity/paternity leave program 
 Employee assistance program 
 401k retirement savings plan 
 Flexible spending accounts 
 Healthy at Houzz program 

Houzz is proud to be an Equal Employment Opportunity employer. When applying for a role at Houzz, we guarantee your application will be considered regardless of your sex, race, religion, color, gender, national origin, height or weight, ancestry, physical or mental disability, medical condition, genetic information, marital status, registered domestic partner status, age, sexual orientation, military and veteran status or any other basis protected by federal, state or local law or ordinance or regulation.

We embrace and celebrate the value that diversity brings to an organization and understand that diverse backgrounds and different points of view are essential components of helping Houzz in our mission to provide the best experience for home renovation and design. Houzz is committed to fostering an inclusive environment through projects and initiatives such as employee resource groups and diversity workshops.

Houzz celebrates differences and strives to create a comfortable and authentic climate for Houzzers to feel supported, where they are welcomed to think creatively and contribute to innovative ideas, while having the freedom to be themselves and share their lives at work.

As a Full-Stack Software Engineer, you will work on all parts of our web application, its libraries, widgets and custom features. Our tech stack includes React, Node, GraphQL, Java, Python, AWS, GitHub, Jenkins, Kubernetes, MySQL, Lucene/Solr, Redis, Javascript, CSS and more.

__________________

 Take high level ideas and transforming them into live products, used by millions of homeowners and professionals from around the world

 Proficiency in web stack programming, from schema design to building user-facing interfaces 
 A desire to build an engaging consumer experience

 1+ years of experience 

Ideally, You'll Also Have

 Independence, self-direction and experience owning complete products and features 
 Experience developing consumer facing features for millions of consumers 
 Familiarity with NoSQL databases and Lucene/Solr 
 Comfort working on fast paced, data-driven projects 
 3+ years experience

MULTIPLE POSITIONS l OPEN TO REMOTE 

Help unlock the true power of data today to create a better tomorrow. 

 

The Intelligence Platform team at Microsoft, is creating a new generation of tools and infrastructure to transform data into insight and into action. The world produces exabytes of data every hour, yet people and organizations tap into only a fraction of its full value today because their tools take too much time and expertise to use. Weâ€™ve set out to make it easy for them to harness data to solve critical problems and create innovative new products, services, and experiences. So that it looks and feels like magic to our users, our team does the hard work to build world-class user experiences, platforms and services that remove the complexity and pain of working with big data. 

 

Weâ€™re looking for great front-end engineers to develop amazing user experiences for our applications and platform tools so people can easily extract the full value of their data. You will solve challenging technical problems and apply the latest open-source web technologies to build modern user interfaces that are performant, reliable, secure, responsive, and accessible. They include web technologies, such as React, Angular, TypeScript, JavaScript, jQuery, HTML5, and D3. 

Weâ€™re a rapidly growing global team. We foster a high-trust environment with great collaboration, open dialogue, and fun. We celebrate our different identities, cultures, experiences, and work styles. We seek out diverse perspectives and challenge our assumptions, so we build the best product together. We value excellence and support each other in learning and growing together. We try new ideas, learn, fail-fast, and try again. And ultimately, we love delighting our customers and helping them succeed. 

 

Weâ€™d like your help in advancing the state-of-the-art in big data! 


Deliver world-class user experiences to customers in collaboration with UX designers and product managers 
Design, code, test, and operate applications that are performant, reliable, secure, responsive, and accessible 
Contribute as a technical leader to the product vision, roadmap, architecture, and planning 
Make engineering investments and build reusable components to ship faster with higher quality and consistency 
Work with customers to make them successful and understand their unmet needs 
Collaborate with partner teams to deliver new value in our product and across Microsoftâ€™s products 
Foster a culture of excellence, inclusion, collaboration, and customer focus 

Required Qualifications 

5+ years of industry software engineering experience with HTML5, CSS, JavaScript/TypeScript, or other Frontend language, and a modern web framework (e.g., React, Angular, Vue) 
5+ years of demonstrated technical leadership in shipping high-quality cloud services and/or applications 

Undergraduate degree in Computer Science OR related engineering experience 
Systematic problem solving with clean, modular design thinking 
Track record of excellence in software engineering, including design, coding, code reviews, testing, and devops 
Excellent technical leadership, mentorship, collaboration, and communication 
Experience with building, deploying, and operating applications and services on cloud platforms (e.g., Azure, AWS, GCP) 
Experience with using big data, streaming, and analytics (e.g., Spark, SQL, Power BI) 
Experience with using data visualization technologies (e.g., D3, Highcharts) 
Growth mindset to learn, seek diverse viewpoints, and stay current with industry trends and techniques 
Startup mentality to move and iterate rapidly, work across disciplines, and focus on customers
